Beatrice Agyeman Abbey bụ onye isi ndị isi Ghana na onye isi njikwa nke Media General bụ ndị nwe TV3, Onua FM, 3FM, Connect FM, Akoma FM na MG Digital si mba Ghana N'afọ 2021, e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi nke afọ na Ghana Entrepreneur and Corporate Executive Awards.
Beatrice nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na nzere masta ya na GIMPA.
Beatrice malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2000 dị ka onye nta akụkọ, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ mgbasa ozi na onye na-ahụ maka akụkọ. N'afọ 2017, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchikota maka Media General

Ọ bụ onye isi nke Media General Digital ruo ihe karịrị otu afọ na onye isi nchikota  nke Media General Radio maka oge ụfọdụ. Ọ gbara ndị ama ama ajụjụ ọnụ dịka John Agyekum Kufuor, John Mahama, na Ellen Johnson Sirleaf
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dịka BBC, Sky TV, Citizen TV, CNN, VOA, na Kiss TV na Kenya.
Na Septemba 2020, e nyere ya onyinye maka Ọkachasị na Mgbasa Ozi na Ghana Women of the Year
Ọ bụ Glitz Africa haziri ya.
N'ọnwa ise  afọ 2021, e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi nke afọ na Ghana Entrepreneur and Corporate Executive Awards
Ọ bụ ndị Entrepreneurs Foundation of Ghana (EFG) haziri ya.
